name: Sauteed Swiss Chard with Mushrooms and Roasted Red Peppers
author: BramptonMommyof2
summary: Made this up when I had Swiss chard and did not know what to do with it. Added whatever I had in the fridge. Added some white wine and voila. Yummy. You can also use other veggies or seasoning you have on hand.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add mushrooms, onion, and garlic; cook and stir until onion is translucent and mushrooms soften, about 5 minutes
Stir in Swiss chard, red pepper, oregano, basil, salt, and black pepper
Cook until Swiss chard is wilted, about 3 minutes
Stir in white wine; cook until Swiss chard is tender, 3 to 4 minutes more
